tr.td: DT.IMMZ.D2.DT.HPV.2doses
Decision Table Determine required vaccinations
draft
WHO
computable

div.p: WHO recommendations for routine immunization – summary tables (March 2023) (1)

tr.td:
Client is not due for HPV vaccination: Client is not due for HPV vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
The current evidence supports the recommendation that a 2-dose schedule be used in the primary target group from 9 years of age and for all older age groups for which HPV vaccines are licensed.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for HPV vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with first HPV dose as client's age is less than 9 years. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for HPV vaccination: Client is due for HPV vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
The WHO-recommended primary target population for HPV vaccination is girls aged 9–14 years. Prevention of cervical cancer is best achieved through the immunization of girls before they become sexually active.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for HPV vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with first HPV dose as no HPV doses were administered, client is female and within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note.: Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note. "Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed"
Vaccination of secondary target populations (e.g. females aged ≥15 years, boys, older males or men who have sex with men) is recommended only if this is feasible and affordable, and does not divert resources from vaccination of the primary target population or effective cervical cancer screening programmes.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note.
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Member States should update this guidance according to the national immunization programme.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note.: Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note. "Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note.
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Member States should update this guidance according to the national immunization programme.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is not due for HPV vaccination: Client is not due for HPV vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
The minimum interval between first and second dose is 6 months. A 12-month schedule results in higher geometric mean titres (GMTs) and is suggested for programmatic and efficiency reasons.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for HPV vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with second HPV dose as the latest HPV dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for HPV vaccination: Client is due for HPV vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for HPV vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with second HPV dose as the latest HPV dose was administered more than 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is not due for HPV vaccination: Client is not due for HPV vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
Individuals known to be immunocompromised or infected with HIV (regardless of age or antiretroviral therapy status) should receive at least two HPV vaccine doses (minimum 6 months interval) and, where possible, three doses.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for HPV vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate for third HPV dose as the latest HPV dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for HPV vaccination: Client is due for HPV vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for HPV vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate for third HPV dose as client is HIV positive and the latest HPV dose was administered more than 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is not due for HPV vaccination: Client is not due for HPV vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for HPV vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate for third HPV dose as the latest HPV dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

Client is due for HPV vaccination: Client is due for HPV vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for HPV vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate for third HPV dose as client is immunocompromised and the latest HPV dose was administered more than 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

HPV immunization schedule is complete: HPV immunization schedule is complete "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete"
–
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output HPV immunization schedule is complete
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (HPV immunization schedule is complete. Two HPV primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

HPV immunization schedule is complete: HPV immunization schedule is complete "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output HPV immunization schedule is complete
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (HPV immunization schedule is complete. Three HPV primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
